## Completion Conditions

- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Release notes are complete
- [ ] Deployment plan is ready
- [ ] Post-release monitoring is set up

## Loop Conditions

- [ ] Tests are failing
- [ ] Release notes are incomplete
- [ ] Deployment plan has issues
- [ ] Post-release monitoring is not set up
